name: FetchAllXeroContacts
description:
Retrieve all contacts from a Xero organization.

Use this tool to obtain a list of all contacts within a specified Xero organization. It should be called when there's a need to access or manage contact information in Xero.

parameters.name: tenant_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string to identify the tenant in Xero.

value_schema.description: Xero identifier for Tenant

parameters.name: filter_by_element
parameters.description: Specify conditions to filter contacts by any element within their data fields.

value_schema.description: Filter by an any element

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting order for contacts based on a specified element, such as name or date.

value_schema.description: Order by an any element

parameters.name: contact_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of ContactIDs to retrieve specific contacts. Use this to filter the contacts returned by their unique IDs in a single call.

value_schema.description: Filter by a comma separated list of ContactIDs. Allows you to retrieve a specific set of contacts in a single call.

parameters.name: pagination_page_number
parameters.description: The specific page number to retrieve when fetching contacts. Each page returns up to 100 contacts.

value_schema.description: e.g. page=1 - Up to 100 contacts will be returned in a single API call.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: A case-insensitive search term for filtering contacts by Name, FirstName, LastName, ContactNumber, or EmailAddress.

value_schema.description: Search parameter that performs a case-insensitive text search across the Name, FirstName, LastName, ContactNumber and EmailAddress fields.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of contact records to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: Number of records to retrieve per page

parameters.name: modified_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Retrieve only records created or modified after the specified timestamp. Use ISO 8601 format for the timestamp.

value_schema.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

parameters.name: include_archived_contacts
parameters.description: Set to true to include contacts with a status of ARCHIVED in the response. False will exclude them.

value_schema.description: e.g. includeArchived=true - Contacts with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

parameters.name: retrieve_summary_only_contacts
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve only lightweight contact fields, excluding computation-heavy data for faster API responses.

value_schema.description: Use summaryOnly=true in GET Contacts and Invoices endpoint to retrieve a smaller version of the response object. This returns only lightweight fields, excluding computation-heavy fields from the response, making the API calls quick and efficient.
